explains: adj. 单身的；独自的；寂寞的；人迹稀少的
n. （Lone）人名；（西、肯）洛内；（丹）隆娜；（缅）伦

sentences.en: A lone sea gull flew across the sky.
sentences.cn: 一只孤独的海鸥在空中飞过。

sentences.en: They perpetuate the myth of the lone genius.
sentences.cn: 他们使孤独天才的神话永垂不朽。

sentences.en: The vision acquired an especially keen charm that made me race with all speed toward my lone gratification.
sentences.cn: 这景象具有一种特别强烈的魅力，使我全速奔向我孤独的满足。
